channel.title: Optimization Series Radio Show - Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Helping you get the most out of what you put into your business.
channel.itunes:author: Stephen Pierce
channel.itunes:summary: He's #1 for helping you get the most out of what you put into your business. The Optimization Series Radio Show featuring Stephen Pierce talking with brilliant business minds to extract strategies to give you a winning edge in your business. A no fluff, high energy results driven show that is sure to make you laugh ...make you smile ...and make your business more profitable.
